author: Laura He, CNN Business
title: China is giving cash to car buyers to revive sales crushed by the pandemic
description: In a normal year, China would have sold more than 6 million new cars by now. This year, the number is closer to 3.7 million, and now the government is handing out cash to help the world's biggest auto market get back on its feet after the coronavirus pandemic.
